TitleEnglish: I've Somehow Gotten Stronger When I Improved My Farm-Related Skills
SummaryEnglish: In order to live a peaceful little life in the countryside, Aru Wayn, a young boy of 17, decides to improve his farming skills as a priority. Although he also improves his other abilities by lending a hand to his friends from time to time, he still makes a point of prioritizing his future career as a farmer. One day, he manages to increase his farming skills to the maximum level and thinks that he will finally be able to live his dream life. However… some unforeseen events are about to upset his plans.
Aliases: Nōmin Kanren no Skill Bakka Agetetara Nazeka Tsuyoku Natta.
Noumin Kanren no Skill Bakka Agetetara Nazeka Tsuyoku Natta.
I Somehow Got Strong by Raising Skills Related to Farming.

1.SummaryEnglish: All Al wants to do is live a tranquil existence as a farmer. Unfortunately for him, unwittingly rescuing the princess means his life is about to become far more complicated.

2.SummaryEnglish: It was supposed to be a simple gathering quest, but Al’s discovery of a black dragon scale becomes an omen of things to come.

3.TitleEnglish: The Farmer and the Malevolent Dragon Ouroboros
3.SummaryEnglish: Al encounters the ghost of Helen’s brother, who begs him to save his sister from Ouroboros.

4.TitleEnglish: The Farmer and the Life That Was Saved
4.SummaryEnglish: Ouroboros won’t go down that easily; the battle for Helen’s soul has only just begun.

5.SummaryEnglish: A fellow adventurer joins Al on his way to Lurugus.

6.TitleEnglish: The Farmer and the Hero Who Can't Become a Hero
6.SummaryEnglish: Loki will stop at nothing to ensure the Hero’s bloodline ends with Ruri!

7.TitleEnglish: The Farmer and the Princess's Resolve
7.SummaryEnglish: Heavy is the head that wears the crown, Fal must accept a political marriage for the sake of the kingdom.

8.SummaryEnglish: Al, Helen, and Ruri must expose Nedilus’ evil deeds and thwart his plan! However, everything depends on rescuing a hostage imprisoned in the castle first.

9.SummaryEnglish: Al had another childhood friend other than Testa, and her name was Ilvia. Al will always remember her.

10.TitleEnglish: The Farmer and the Town of Ashparagus
10.SummaryEnglish: Linea knows something is wrong in Gull Town and wants the guild to investigate.

11.TitleEnglish: The Farmer and the Reunion at the Demon King Castle
11.SummaryEnglish: Al gets more than he bargains for when he rescues a young girl from her assailants; she’s the daughter of the Demon King, and she needs Al’s help to save demon kind!

12.TitleEnglish: The Farmer and the Renewed Resolve
12.SummaryEnglish: Al’s mind reels from a shocking revelation! He has many questions, but he will only receive the answers if he accepts a dark bargain.
